active_learning.discussion_prompt: In the context of ISA/IEC 62443 standards, debate the trade-offs of using PKI certificates for authenticating manufacturing equipment in IIoT environments versus traditional password-based methods. Consider OT reliability requirements (e.g., low latency, high availability), potential failure modes like certificate revocation during production downtime, and real-world impacts on IACS safety.
